name: Midnight
description: Midnight, a popular strain in Israel, is a sativa-dominant variety developed by Tikun Olam to treat nausea. This high-CBD strain also controls pain, inflammation, and indigestion, with uplifting and invigorating effects ideal for daytime consumption.
descriptionPlain: Midnight, a popular strain in Israel, is a sativa-dominant variety developed by Tikun Olam to treat nausea. This high-CBD strain also controls pain, inflammation, and indigestion, with uplifting and invigorating effects ideal for daytime consumption.

highlightedReviews.text:
As a Vet forgotten by the VA because I was having a good day when they "evaluated" me and determine I was 0% disabled! Now it's been long enough that the VA can shrug it's collective shoulders and tells me they don't care how many back surgeries (5) so now fighting my pain had become a crusade with me. Finding the right strain to make our lives better. Like Midnight and Blue Dream. One gives me pain relief while the other helps me sleep!! My pain is such that I normally sleep 2-3 hours then the pain wakes me and I have to walk around to help alleviate my pain so I can try for another 2 or 3 hours. But, now it's one hit from "Midnight" and one from Blue Dream and I last maybe 15 minutes before I'm off to dreamland.!
Again, thank God for SCIENCE !!! peace
Gets me through everyday! Chronic pain due to injury and now nerve pain along with a dollop of arthritis. I have this in a concentrate pen and flower. Amazing

articles.title: 5 Great Pain Relief, High-CBD Cannabis Strains from Israel
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
For some, it may come as a surprise that Israel stands among the global leaders in medicinal cannabis research. Discoveries made in the footsteps of Raphael Mechoulam (the internationally acclaimed researcher who first isolated THC) have brought new meaning to medical cannabis as strains are engineered to contain optimal levels of cannabinoids.
Here are just a few strains from the Israeli cannabis supplier Tikun Olam that we recently added to the Leafly Explorer. Most of them are low- to moderate-THC and high-CBD, meaning they offer imperceptible psychoactive effects but strong medical relief from pain symptoms. One strain, however, is a balanced blend of low-to-moderate THC and CBD. Enjoy!
1. Avi-Dekel
Characteristics of Avi-Dekel:

Sativa-dominant
Tests up to 16.3% CBD
Non-psychoactive; THC content as low as 0.8%
May treat inflammation, sleep disorders, and indigestion

2. Midnight
Characteristics of Midnight:

Sativa-dominant
Tests up to 12.4% CBD
THC content of about 12.7%
Controls pain, inflammation, and indigestion

3. Eran Almog
Characteristics of Eran Almog:

80% indica
Tests up to 28% THC
May treat sleep disorders, nausea, inflammation, pain, and indigestion

4. El-Na 
Characteristics of El-Na: 

A 50/50 hybrid 
Balanced THC (as low as 8.2%) and CBD (up to 6.5%) for patients unaccustomed to psychoactive effects
Good for pain, nausea, and stress relief 

5. Rafael 
Characteristics of Rafael: 

Sativa-dominant 
High CBD; up to 18.6% 
Low THC; as low as 1%
